plot: The group stops in a retirement community to visit Aunt Vera, but Ben finds the aged residents to be quite a bit more physically dynamic than one should ever expect.

The group goes to visit Aunt Vera who's now living in a retirement community. Ben witnesses some of the residents climbing walls and other superhuman behavior. When Grandpa Max is affected, it's up to Ben and Gwen to find out what's going on.—Jesse Sanchez
